name: Dress to Play - Cute Witches!
synopsis: In Dress To Play: Cute Witches! dress to play and play to dress! Make a little witch and design her outfit in the dressing room. When you finish, get ready to set off on an adventure as your character flies away on her broomstick to a peaceful world inhabited by fantasy characters. The more you play, the more rewards and gifts you'll receive. Youâ€™ll also earn more items of clothing to dress your little witches in!
